entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Nelson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:35 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -37.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Nelson Airport 07:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -37.2°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -41.3°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 35.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 35. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 30 except minus 26 over southern sections.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30 except minus 26 over southern sections. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
